title: WasteLand(不毛之地)模组无法导致Minecraft启动
txt_content:
1.7.10Forge,我安装了Fastcraft(快速工艺),BetterFps(更好的Fps),NEI,Optifine(高清修补),WasteLand(不毛之地),jnbt(API,不毛之地前置) 

系统Win7,RAM有2G,盗版,启动器HMCL-2.3.3,crash-reports也没有生成文件,开HMCL的调试模式
HMCL生成的日志(并非错误报告) 


[19:29:59][main/INFO] Initialized settings.
[19:30:57][AWT-EventQueue-0/INFO] Start generating launching command...
[19:30:58][Game Launcher/ERROR] Unable to decompress library file: F:\Game\Minecraft\PC\Client\1.8\1.8+Optifine+forge\.minecraft\libraries\tv\twitch\twitch-external-platform\4.5\twitch-external-platform-4.5-natives-windows-32.jar to F:\Game\Minecraft\PC\Client\1.8\1.8+Optifine+forge\.minecraft\versions\1.8-Forge11.14.3.1450\1.8-Forge11.14.3.1450-natives
java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file
    at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method)
    at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source)
    at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source)
    at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source)
    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.ek.a(SourceFile:120)
    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.h.b(SourceFile:62)
    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.h.a(SourceFile)
    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.j.a(Unknown Source)
    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.dJ.a(SourceFile:47)
    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.k.a(SourceFile:111)
    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.co.run(SourceFile:416)
[19:30:58][Game Launcher/INFO] *** Make shell command ***
[19:30:58][Game Launcher/INFO] On making head command.
[19:30:58][Game Launcher/INFO] System Physical Memory: 1984
[19:30:58][Game Launcher/INFO] On making java.library.path.
[19:30:59][Game Launcher/INFO] On making launcher args.


开了HMCL的调试模式也没有用，任务管理器中没有显示JAVA的进程，JAVA8 64位，1.7.10，Forge版本10.13.2.1291，把MOD删了就好了，但我需要这个MOD呀！

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 重下WasteLand，这可能是压缩包损坏。

ItIsEnderman 发表于 2015-7-28 19:57
重下WasteLand，这可能是压缩包损坏。
是jar！！哪里来的压缩包

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
2916201529 发表于 2015-7-28 20:03
是jar！！哪里来的压缩包
.jar文件是.zip格式的，所以视同压缩包。

ItIsEnderman 发表于 2015-7-28 20:23
.jar文件是.zip格式的，所以视同压缩包。
已重新下载，没用！再说.jar不是.zip/.rar格式，只是玩家们用.zip/.rar格式打开！
